text: Due to the political status of Taiwan, the Republic of China (ROC) competed as Chinese Taipei () at the 1994 Winter Olympics in Lillehammer, Norway. The International Olympic Committee mandates that the Chinese Taipei Olympic Committee flag is used, and not the flag of the Republic of China. ==Bobsleigh== {|class="wikitable" border="1" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Sled !rowspan="2"|Athletes !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Run 1 !colspan="2"|Run 2 !colspan="2"|Run 3 !colspan="2"|Run 4 !colspan="2"|Total |- !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align="center"|TPE-1 |Sun Kuang-Ming Chang Min-Jung |Two-man |align="center"|54.48 |align="center"|33 |align="center"|54.63 |align="center"|32 |align="center"|55.24 |align="center"|39 |align="center"|55.09 |align="center"|36 |align="center"|3:39.44 |align="center"|35 |} ==References== *Official Olympic Reports * Olympic Winter Games 1994, full results by sports-reference.com Category:Nations at the 1994 Winter Olympics 1994
title: Chinese Taipei at the 1994 Winter Olympics
